name: HomeConnectCoffeeMachine
0:
”Alexa, start My Coffee Machine.”
”Alexa, tell My Coffee Machine to prepare an Espresso.”
”Alexa, tell My Coffee Machine to prepare a large very strong Cappuccino.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my coffee machine
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With this skill, you can control your Home Connect coffee machine using just your voice. Order your coffee just the way you like it, hands-free.

Features:
* Choose from any of the regular or favorite coffee programs on your machine as well as the Home Connect CoffeeWorld programs
* Turn your coffee machine on and off
* Use your coffee machine in Alexa routines: turn your coffee machine on so that it's rinsed and ready to use when you get up in the morning, prepare your favorite coffee or turn it off. When creating a routine, please select "Smart Home" from the list of actions. To learn more about using your coffee machine in routines visit the Home Connect website [www.home-connect.com/alexa-smarthome]. Please note: the EQ.500 doesn't yet support beverage preparation.
* Enter Assist mode without launching the skill first ("Alexa, tell My Coffee Machine to assist me")
* Check when your coffee machine needs to be cleaned ("Alexa, ask My Coffee Machine when it needs to be cleaned")
* Support of visual content and touch interaction on Echo Show devices
* You can now skip the rinse during turn-on, enjoying your beverage directly after turning on the device (only supported by certain coffee machines) ("Alexa, ask My Coffee Machine to turn the rinse on/off")
* Remember that the coffee machine has four fill quantity levels (small, medium, large, and extra large), so double-check your selection to ensure you get the desired amount of coffee. 

Selection of supported commands:
"Alexa, tell My Coffee Machine I want a large, very strong Cappuccino."
"Alexa, tell My Coffee Machine to prepare a latte and start now."
"Alexa, ask My Coffee Machine for a small Americano."
"Alexa, ask My Coffee Machine to assist me."
"Alexa, ask My Coffee Machine for its status."
"Alexa, ask My Coffee Machine if it needs to be cleaned."
"Alexa, tell My Coffee Machine to turn on."
"Alexa, tell My Coffee Machine to turn off."
"Alexa, ask My Coffee Machine to disable rinsing on start."
"Alexa, tell My Coffee Machine to make my favorite espresso."
"Alexa, tell My Coffee Machine to start my favorite."
"Alexa, ask My Coffee Machine about my favorites."
"Alexa, ask My Coffee Machine what coffee I can get."

Further tips:
* Shortcut: Say "start" or "start now" when you order to get your coffee without Alexa asking you to confirm ("Alexa, ask My Coffee Machine for a strong Espresso and start now")
* If you have any issues with the skill, please try re-enabling it.
* In order to use this skill, you need to link your Home Connect account to Alexa. You can register an account in the Home Connect app. Please also make sure that you pair your coffee machine with the Home Connect app.
* This skill supports coffee machines with Home Connect from Bosch, Siemens, Gaggenau, Neff and Thermador.

Please be aware that the skill might not support all home appliance features as available in the Home Connect app. We are continuously working on new version releases to improve and enrich the skill experience. If you have any questions or comments regarding the skill, please send them to the email address below.

Contact and feedback:
For more information about the Home Connect skills please visit: www.home-connect.com/alexa
If you have questions or comments, send an email to service.us@home-connect.com.

Your Home Connect Team
